caseTitle: Amanullah Khan v. Hospital Director, KTH(MTI), Peshawar & others
tagline: (1). Upgradation of a post is not a vested right but it stems from a policy decision for the particular set of employees as per scheme which cannot be mixed up with the promotion. (2) In order to justify the up-gradation, the Government/competent authority is required to establish that the department needs restructuring, reform or to meet the exigency of service in the public interest.
